newsitem.title: HUNGARY: CESI index dips, ends at 1,482.27 points.
newsitem.headline: CESI index dips, ends at 1,482.27 points.

text.p: The CESI Central European Share Index eased up 2.39 points or 0.16 percent to 1,482.27 points on Thursday, the Budapest Stock Exchange said.
The index reflects trends of 72 Hungarian, Polish, Czech, Slovak and Slovenian shares.
